description: You can control you home electrical appliances by voice command. You can on or off lamp or you can control the speed of the fan. You will be required a Raspberry pi working as MQTT client. Details: https://www.hackster.io/taifur/voice-controlled-smart-home-36e37e
name: Pi Home Master
shortDescription: Alexa_pi Home Master is a custom skill to control your home appliances by your voice.
